import { Accordion, AccordionItemHeading, AccordionItemPanel, AccordionItem, AccordionItemButton } from "react-accessible-accordion"; import './forecast.css'; const WEEK_DAYS = ['Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday']; const Forecast = ({ data }) => { const dayInAWeek = new Date().getDay(); const forecastDays = WEEK_DAYS.slice(dayInAWeek, WEEK_DAYS.length).concat(WEEK_DAYS.slice(0, dayInAWeek)); console.log(forecastDays); return ( <> {data.list.slice(0, 7).map((item, idx) => (
))} ) } export default Forecast;
